publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3368 Mr Jim Wallace: Scotland's Links with the United States of Americaâ€”That the Parliament notes the educational, historical, cultural and economic links between Scotland and the USA and wishes to see these developed and enhanced to the mutual benefit of both countries.Supported by: Iain Gray*
S1M-3368 Scotland's Links with the United States of America (lodged on 9 September 2002) Alex Neil*
